docs.text: User Authentication User Login Page: User Login Method: POST Name: User Login Description: Login For User Endpoint: http://{{subdomain}}.{{domain}}/auth/login Request: Headers CSRF: "X-XSRF-TOKEN" : "eyJpdiI6IjhmR...", (type: string, required: true, description: Obtain from GET request to "http://{{domain}}/sanctum/csrf-cookie" Headers Token: "Authorization": "Bearer ${token}", (type: string, required: true, description: Bearer token) Parameters: "username": "tester", (type: string, required: true, description: Username of user) "password": "password" (type: string, required: true, description: Password of user) "browser_id": "3820c94b-b630-403e-a064-d3137488845f" (type: string:uuid V4, optional: true, description: Browser id for user retrive from cookie) Responses: SUCCESS: Status: 200 Ok Example: { "token": "37|Yt6oeZamDOqKdDPGUPDT80Xulp6KPDvX32C4BlvV", "user": { "id": 1, "first": "tester1", "last": "tester2", "phone": "55-80-27-89-89", "username": "tester", "created_at": "2021-04-02T02:53:46.000000Z", "updated_at": "2021-04-02T02:53:46.000000Z" }, "browser_id": "37646037-8230-4905-8250-cfff968e1714" } ERRORS: Status: 422 Unprocessable Entity Example: { "error": { "password": [ "The password field is required." ] }, "message": "Failed validation" } Status: 422 Unprocessable Entity Example: { "error": [], "message": "Invalid Credentials" } User Two Factor Authentication Code Verify Page: User Two Factor Authentication Code Verify Method: POST Name: User Two Factor Authentication Code Description: Two Factor Authentication Code For LOGGED User Endpoint: http://{{subdomain}}.{{domain}}/auth/code-verify Request: Headers CSRF: "X-XSRF-TOKEN" : "eyJpdiI6IjhmR...", (type: string, required: true, description: Obtain from GET request to "http://{{domain}}/sanctum/csrf-cookie" Headers Token: "Authorization": "Bearer ${token}", (type: string, required: true, description: Bearer token) Parameters: "code": "12345", (type: string, required: true, description: 5 Digit verification code ), "browser_id": "3820c94b-b630-403e-a064-d3137488845f" (type: string:uuid V4, optional: true, description: Browser id for subdomain user retrive from cookie) Responses: SUCCESS: Status: 200 Ok Example: { "data": [ { "token": "10|fQAK7wdQkTf44RUuDZWRfIyw3qGv5hQvIWOLHI97", "user": { "id": 3, "name": "tester", "username": "tester", "created_at": "2021-03-27T18:06:27.000000Z", "updated_at": "2021-03-27T18:06:27.000000Z" } } ] } ERRORS: Status: 422 Unprocessable Entity Example: { "error": { "code": [ "The code field is required." ] }, "message": "Failed validation" } Status: 422 Unprocessable Entity Example: { "error": [], "message": "Invalid Code" } Remember User Session Page: Remember User Session Method: POST Name: User Remember Session Description: CHANGE User Session Remember (two-factor-authentication needed) Endpoint: http://{{subdomain}}.{{domain}}/auth/remember Request: Headers CSRF: "X-XSRF-TOKEN" : "eyJpdiI6IjhmR...", (type: string, required: true, description: Obtain from GET request to "http://{{domain}}/sanctum/csrf-cookie" Headers Token: "Authorization": "Bearer ${token}", (type: string, required: true, description: Bearer token) Parameters: "is_remembered": 1, (type: boolean, required: true, description: 1 for remember and 0 for do not remember session), "browser_id": "3820c94b-b630-403e-a064-d3137488845f" (type: string:uuid V4, optional: true, description: Browser id for subdomain user retrive from cookie) Responses: SUCCESS: Status: 200 Ok Example: { "message": "Session changes saved" } ERRORS: Status: 422 Unprocessable Entity Example: { "error": { "is_remembered": [ "The is remembered field is required." ] }, "message": "Failed validation" } Status: 422 Unprocessable Entity Example: { "error": { "browser_id": [ "The selected browser id is invalid." ] }, "message": "Failed validation" } User Register Page: User Register Method: POST Name: Register Description: Register For New User Endpoint: http://{{subdomain}}.{{domain}}/auth/register Request: Headers CSRF: "X-XSRF-TOKEN" : "eyJpdiI6IjhmR...", (type: string, required: true, description: Obtain from GET request to "http://{{domain}}/sanctum/csrf-cookie" Headers Token: "Authorization": "Bearer ${token}", (type: string, required: true, description: Bearer token) Parameters: "first": "tester", (type: string, required: true, description: First name of user of main subdomain ) "last": "tester", (type: string, required: true, description: Last name of user of main subdomain ) "username": "tester", (type: string, required: true, description: Username of main subdomain ) "password": "password" (type: string, required: true, description: Password for subdomain user) "password_confirmation": "password_confirmation" (type: string, required: true, description: Password confirmation for subdomain user) "phone": "5580278960" (type: string, required: true, description: Password confirmation for subdomain user) "config": "{"permisions":{"ability_1":["module1:index","module1:create","module1:show","module1:update","module1:delete"],"ability_2":["module1:create","module1:show","module1:update","module2:index","module2:create","module2:show","module2:update","module2:delete"],"ability_3":["module1:index"]},"roles":["admin"]}", (type: json, optional: true, description: abilities and permisions for new user ) Responses: SUCCESS: Status: 200 Ok Example: { "data": [ { "token": "10|fQAK7wdQkTf44RUuDZWRfIyw3qGv5hQvIWOLHI97", "user": { "id": 3, "name": "tester", "username": "tester", "created_at": "2021-03-27T18:06:27.000000Z", "updated_at": "2021-03-27T18:06:27.000000Z" } } ] } ERRORS: Status: 422 Unprocessable Entity Example: { "error": { "password": [ "The password field is required." ] }, "message": "Failed validation" } Status: 422 Unprocessable Entity Example: { "error": [], "message": "Invalid Credentials" } User Logout Page: User Logout Method: POST Name: Tenancy Logout Description: Logout For User Endpoint: http://{{subdomain}}.{{domain}}/auth/logoout Request: Headers CSRF: "X-XSRF-TOKEN" : "eyJpdiI6IjhmR...", (type: string, required: true, description: Obtain from GET request to "http://{{domain}}/sanctum/csrf-cookie" Headers Token: "Authorization": "Bearer ${token}", (type: string, required: true, description: Bearer token) Responses: SUCCESS: Status: 200 OK ERRORS: Status: 500 Internal Server Error User Info Page: User Info Method: POST Name: Register Description: Info for Logged User (two-factor-authentication needed) Endpoint: http://{{subdomain}}.{{domain}}/user Request: Headers CSRF: "X-XSRF-TOKEN" : "eyJpdiI6IjhmR...", (type: string, required: true, description: Obtain from GET request to "http://{{domain}}/sanctum/csrf-cookie" Headers Token: "Authorization": "Bearer ${token}", (type: string, required: true, description: Bearer token) Responses: SUCCESS: Status: 200 Ok Example: { "user": { "id": 1, "username": "Sergio", "created_at": "2021-04-02T02:53:46.000000Z", "updated_at": "2021-04-02T02:53:46.000000Z" } } ERRORS: Status: 404 Not Found Status: docs.text: Users User List Page: User List Method: GET Name: Register Description: List of users User Endpoint: https://{{subdomain}}.{{domain}}/user/list Request: Headers CSRF: "X-XSRF-TOKEN" : "eyJpdiI6IjhmR...", (type: string, required: true, description: Obtain from GET request to "http://{{domain}}/sanctum/csrf-cookie" Headers Token: "Authorization": "Bearer ${token}", (type: string, required: true, description: Bearer token) Responses: Example: { "data": { "current_page": 1, "data": [ { "id": 1, "first": null, "last": null, "phone": "5580278960", "username": "Sergio", "created_at": "2021-04-29T13:16:01.000000Z", "updated_at": "2021-04-30T04:44:56.000000Z", "is_active": 0, "status_reason": null, "suspendido_at": null, "avatar": null, "last_session": null, "activated_at": null, "current_session_id": "344eede7-9f56-4c0a-82fa-33c26e6edd76" }, { "id": 2, "first": null, "last": null, "phone": null, "username": "tester", "created_at": "2021-04-29T13:16:01.000000Z", "updated_at": "2021-04-30T03:05:49.000000Z", "is_active": 0, "status_reason": null, "suspendido_at": null, "avatar": null, "last_session": null, "activated_at": null, "current_session_id": "0e677631-3303-49e3-9df4-7a6b59a35958" } ], "first_page_url": "https://{{subdomain}}.{{domain}}/user/list?page=1", "from": 1, "last_page": 1, "last_page_url": "https://{{subdomain}}.{{domain}}/user/list?page=1", "links": [ { "url": null, "label": "« Previous", "active": false }, { "url": "https://{{subdomain}}.{{domain}}/user/list?page=1", "label": "1", "active": true }, { "url": null, "label": "Next »", "active": false } ], "next_page_url": null, "path": "https://{{subdomain}}.{{domain}}/user/list", "per_page": 15, "prev_page_url": null, "to": 2, "total": 2 }, "headers": [ { "text": "Nombre", "align": "start", "sortable": true, "value": "name" }, { "text": "Rol", "value": "role_name", "sortable": true }, { "text": "Acciones", "value": "actions", "sortable": false } ], "title": "Usuarios" } ERRORS: Status: 404 Not Found
